name: Omlet
description:
YOUR MISSION

Make the most fried eggs without dying.

Be careful, with each egg laid, your health drops!

And be careful not to starve!

CONTROLS

ZQSD -> Move

E -> Eat

SPACE -> Jump

MOUSE_LEFT -> Lay an egg

MORE INFO 

This game was made in less than a day for a school project. The theme of this 1 day jam was "Gravity is a lie".

Assets are from the Unity Assets Store and the sound are from the web. 
All other things are done by me.
Rig of the chicken was made by my friend, you can view these projects here : https://www.instagram.com/noah.djafer/?hl=fr
